segments.text: I notice the water cascading down from the sink, and it fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so lost in her task; it’s almost impressive how she’s unaware of the torrent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks determined, almost audacious, reaching for those cookies, and I feel a mix of admiration and concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every inch he stretches makes my heart race; the stool looks ready to tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, wide-eyed and hopeful, her arm raised, completely oblivious to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a boundary being crossed here, one that makes me both excited and uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming in almost feels like a spotlight on this little act of rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR
